abilities.description: When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.2f2ba4090b22a122]{Enter the Fray} with pistols in hand, or @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.a903d120af3b1475]{Battle} by unleashing a whirlwind of gunfire, add +1. On a hit, take +2 momentum.

When you @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.ae5994ceb3cba098]{Strike} or @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.723192c97fec4fe2]{Clash} with a flurry of shots, you may roll your action die up to three times (or roll three action dice at once), keeping the highest. On a strong hit, mark progress. On a weak hit or miss, after resolving the outcome of the attack, immediately @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.8d9830fb825057b0]{Check Your Gear} to see if you have more pistols and ammo at the ready. If not, this asset is unusable for the remainder of the fight.
When you participate in a charged or antagonistic parlay with your pistols on display, take +2 momentum at the start of the interaction.
